title: BestCrypt 2.0.27 – Take command of storing confidential data

title: Disk Mounter 1.1 – The easier way to manage external disks & volumes
content: Disk Mounter is simple utility that gives you easier way to manage external disks & volumes. title: Battery Time Indicator 1.2 – Useful battery remaining time indicator
content: This Battery Indicator looks like a default one, but it combines the battery icon and the remaining time indicator, hence saves some space in the status bar   Version 1.2: Added percentage view New B/W icons   OS X 10.10 or later, 64-bit processor

title: Wheels of Aurelia 1.0 – A narrative road trip game
